summary: This is a government exhibit index from the criminal case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell, listing hundreds of exhibits to be produced to the defense. It catalogs a wide range of evidence including message pads, birth certificates, photographs, financial records, flight logs, and correspondence, primarily related to Jeffrey Epstein, Ghislaine Maxwell, and multiple minor victims.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The defendant in the criminal case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell. Numerous exhibits are photographs of her, emails to/from her, and records related to her finances and properties.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Deceased financier and alleged co-conspirator. The index lists many photographs of him, emails, flight records, and references to his properties.

persons.name: David Rodgers
persons.context: Pilot for Epstein; the index includes his flight logbooks covering periods from 1991 to 2013.

connections.description: Frequently photographed together; listed emails between them; an exhibit is described as a 'Ghislaine Maxwell and Jeffrey Epstein Relationship Essay'.
David Rodgers' flight logbooks are listed as exhibits, indicating he was a pilot for Epstein's aircraft.

events.title: Exhibit Production to Defense
events.description: The primary date listed for the production of the vast majority of evidentiary exhibits to Ghislaine Maxwell's defense team.

events.title: Journal Entry
events.description: A journal entry from January 7, 1996, is listed as an exhibit (GX-603).

events.title: Journal Entry
events.description: A journal entry from January 25, 1996, is listed as an exhibit (GX-604).

keyFacts: The document is an extensive exhibit index for the criminal prosecution of Ghislaine Maxwell, listing over 1000 potential exhibits.
Evidence includes birth certificates for six different minor victims (identified as Minor Victim-1 through Minor Victim-6).
Physical evidence listed includes massage tables from Florida and New York, a black contact book, a box of costumes, and multiple hard drives.
Photographic evidence includes many images of Ghislaine Maxwell and Jeffrey Epstein together on planes, at properties, and with others.
The index references email chains between Jeffrey Epstein and at least one minor victim, and between Epstein and Maxwell.
